channel.title: F2P2006 RS remake, 2 years of work
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2he9bnp.png[/img]
This project was started on [b]August 04, 2011.[/b] [size=24pt][b] So I spent like 2 years of my life on this and I'm done with it so here you go, no point of it sitting on my desktop anymore. I don't care what anybody says about it, my goal was to create content and I did that Here you go: http://up.ht/1ay6mYW[/b][/size]
Rest of the thread from the dev thread:
[color=red]The [b]red[/b] color code means the feature has not yet been started. The [b][color=orange]orange[/b] color code means the feature has been started and is under construction. [color=green]The [b]green[/b] color code means the feature has been finished.
[b]Latest updates:[/b]
[ul]Distance checking Combat bugs Npc definitions[/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img] [b]Combat[/b]
[ul][li][color=orange]PvP fully complete[/li] [li][color=red]PvN fully complete[/li] [li][color=orange]Perfect max hit formulas[/li] [li][color=orange]Perfect accuracy formula[/li] [li][color=orange]Equipment requirements[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img] [b]Magic[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Every modern combat spell[/li] [li][color=green]Can't mage through walls[/li] [li][color=green]Alching[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img] [b]Ranged[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Bows/arrows[/li] [li][color=green]Can't shoot through walls[/li] [li][color=green]Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img] [b]Prayer[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]All bones bury-able[/li] [li][color=green]Every prayer working properly[/li] [li][color=green]Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] [b]Mining[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Emptying and refilling rocks[/li] [li][color=green]All ores can be mined[/li] [li][color=green]Correct pickaxe finding and animations[/li] [li][color=orange]Prospecting[/li] [li][color=red]Random chance of obtaining gems[/li] [li][color=green]Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [b]Smithing[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]All bars can be made[/li] [li][color=green]All bars can be forged into items[/li] [li][color=green]All equipment can be produced[/li] [li][color=green]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [b]Fishing[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]All fish can be caught[/li] [li][color=green]Big net fishing[/li] [li][color=green]Correct item requirements[/li] [li][color=green]Fishing spots located all around the world[/li] [li][color=green]Correct animations[/li] [li][color=red]Moving fishing locations[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [b]Cooking[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Picking wheat[/li] [li][color=green]Filling flour bin[/li] [li][color=red]Bread[/li] [li][color=red]Pizza[/li] [li][color=red]Cakes[/li] [li][color=green]Potatoes[/li] [li][color=green]Eating food (in pieces)[/li] [li][color=green]Correct animation and timing used[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img] [b]Woodcutting[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Stumps and regrowing trees[/li] [li][color=green]Correct hatchet finding[/li] [li][color=green]Correct hatchet animations[/li] [li][color=green]All trees cut-able[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [b]Firemaking[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]All logs light able[/li] [li][color=green]Adding and depleting of lightened logs[/li] [li][color=green]Ashes appear after logs burn out[/li] [li][color=green]Correct animations[/li] [li][color=green]Clipped[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] [b]Crafting[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Leather crafting[/li] [li][color=green]Full tanning[/li] [li][color=green]Pottery (fired and unfired items)[/li] [li][color=red]Gem cutting[/li] [li][color=orange]Jewellry making[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] [b]Runecrafting[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]All altars working[/li] [li][color=red]Correct multiple crafting[/li] [li][color=green]Talismans "pull" to altars[/li] [li][color=green]Tiaras enchanting[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img] [b]Music and Sounds[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]All skilling sounds[/li] [li][color=green]Various attacking sounds[/li] [li][color=green]Music on region of player[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img] [b]Quests[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Cook's Assistant[/li] [li][color=green]Tutorial Island[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/23thvsw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/anlh8x.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2wcijon.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/30molco.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2zpteg2.png[/img]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2P9Qddrvw6Y http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iuVpGJST2dU http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C1iF077Ph_Y http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jsyUzRTO_aQ http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ixSUydkRyyc http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R5kcbDgAAdM http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M45OXNuQvP4 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cEtIarIKJNw&feature=youtu.be http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=trbAZ5Yxv2w&feature=youtu.be http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qXrB2SOxI8k http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WnoS8snnZlU http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JaP4rWANc4M http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=507yDXZ8dCw http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QM3NMj-lHs4
Credits: Ranqm Me Delta Robert HALFLIVE 9

item.source: F2P2006 RS remake, 2 years of work

item.title: F2P2006 RS remake, 2 years of work
item.dc:creator: @jerkpar jerkpar
item.description:
@jerkpar wrote:

Hi my name is josh and I am a very passionate runescape player and my favorite and most nostalgic time in rs was 2006! F2P to be exact!
I saw your post and source code release. Now I cant even say what a good job you have done on the remake! More than I could ever do!

I am currently trying to learn java so I could host a 2006 server. Now since I am a novice at java I am stuck on trying to compile it because of the “anti-leech”…

Since I am very new to java I looked through the Player and Client.java and could not figure out why it will not compile correctly… =( I wish to make your work live on and give you full credit! As this is a learning process for me… If I were to upgrade or change anything it would be small and you would still receive full credit.

But anyways… I was wondering if you could give me a quick hand in editing the server so I could make changes to it…

Sincerely:
Joshua Conti

P.S: I understand that “Anti-Leeches” Prevent idiots from stealing your years of work and calling it theirs… But I really want to stress it enough that you would receive 100% full credit. So if you could help a noob into the RSPS community. I would truly be in your debt forever! Thanks for your time! =)

Read full topic
item.source: F2P2006 RS remake, 2 years of work

item.title: F2P2006 RS remake, 2 years of work
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

If you’re a beginner in programming I do not recommend this source. A lot of the code is badly written. We haven’t rewritten old parts which probably means they are poorly programmed. Which I do not blame anyone for. You learn much from a project like this and your first codes are much uglier than your latest ones.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @daeree daeree
item.description:
@daeree wrote:

#BUMP

Nice job, haven’t seen a remake as good as this in many years glad to see one finally released thank you. I’m just curious about one thing. When I run the source and I’ve portforward and everything is setup correctly it, it still says the server is “Offline” although when I run some of my other sources the server says “Online”. I’m not understanding, is this what an anti-leech is? Be awfully kind if someone could help me.

Read full topic
